docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

The following is a three-letter acronym: TBD

The HTML specification is maintained by the W3C.

What about IEEE, what does it mean?

docs.title: Reuse Block 1
docs.text:
This is a piece or reusable text. Hopefully! Hopefully!

What happens if we put IEEE in here. Is it an abbreviation with help text?

docs.title: Reuse Block 2
docs.text:
This is a totally different snippet in a different location with the HTML acronym.

Important

We can have any Markdown we want in here. We can even have an HTML acronym in here too!

Some more text here.

TWi

The unit price is 12.5

This Technically Write IT Ltd. company name variable is defined in the mkdocs.yml file under extra -> company -> name.

docs.title: Yet Another Index File
docs.text: This is another file with content. I wonder is the IEEE abbreviation is recognized.
